issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.bar" 23 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "google.com" 17 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "server certificate" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "*.foo.bar" 4 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "172.1.2.16" 4 times.
